content: crochet hatch beanie - beanie hat made from the rib to crown and finished off with a faux fur pom pom the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - adult level intermediate copyright ©2025 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-hatch-beanie-hat/
